https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5R70ehKGh5V0ZYOdikxwSfoLGMt.jpg Luca follows in his father's footsteps to rescue his mother from evil Ladja. Finding the heavenly hero who wields the Zenithian sword is his only hope. Dragon Quest: Your Story
